name: 翁頌舜
objective: 介紹資料庫系統與資料庫管理之基本概念，熟悉基本指令及操作方法，使之能輕易建立資料表，並可對其資料進行擷取、添加、刪除、修改、編輯、排序、建立索引及產生標準報表列印等。
schedule:
1. Introduction to Database Systems
2. The Relational Model and Normalization
3. Introduction to Structured Query Language
4. Database Design Using Normalization
5. Data Modeling with the Entity-Relationship Model
6. Transforming Data Models into Database Designs
7. SQL for Database Construciton and Application Processing
8. Database Redesign
9. Managing Multiuser Databases
10. Managing Databases with SQL Server
11. Big Data, Data Warehouses, and Business Intelligence Systems
scorePolicy:
1. Homework, Quiz and Project Assignment 25%
2. Class Participation and Class Attendance  15%
3. Midterm Exam 30%
4. Final Exam 30%
materials:
1. Database Processing, Fundamentals, Design, and Implementation, 13th Edition, David M. Kroenke and David J. Auer, Publisher: Person.
2. Database Systems: Design, Implementation and Management, 10 Edition, 2013, Carlos Coronel, Steven Morris and Peter Rob, Publisher: Joe Sabatino.
